name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChannelSpy: The Pulse of YouTube's Dynamics

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitor subscriber counts, view counts, and engage with channel dynamics in real-time. Your ultimate tool for YouTube insight.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChannelSpy: The Pulse of YouTube's Dynamics is a Chrome extension that allows users to monitor real-time subscriber and view counts of any YouTube channel. It's a straightforward and powerful tool for YouTube content creators, marketers, and fans who want to keep an eye on channel performance with ease.

How to Use ChannelSpy:

1) After installing ChannelSpy, click on its icon in your browser's extension toolbar.
2) Initially, you'll need to input the YouTube channel handle you're interested in tracking. Remember to enter the handle without the '@' symbol.
3) ChannelSpy will then display the latest subscriber count, view count, and a thumbnail image from the channel, updating these details regularly to ensure you have the most current information.
4) To track a different YouTube channel, simply click the settings icon at the bottom right of the extension popup and change the channel handle.
